item.title: Dear sir/madam Could you please ask aerial manager & Trowbridge resident association chair member for an update on Osborne Road barrier gate being fixed. Trowbridge resident association chair member advertising no updates, information for a number of years on Trowbridge resident association group websites which this information is outdated and incorrect.Could chair member please give current ETA, update to Osborne Road E9 5JR barrier gate is going to be fixed.Antisocial behaviour at Osborne Road garages,legal parking, no parking enforcement, unauthorized vehicle or hours.Residents with any problems please make contact with your chair member Trowbridge resident association group. To discuss any issues on the estate & antisocial behaviour,crime. You can make contact with your Trowbridge resident association group chair member via website link. Please feel free to contact us with any issues around the estate. Trowbridge Residents Association | Homeowners Association Business https://share.google/V0EetNBq8U8GhGdxR Email: eugene.egan70@gmail.com Phone: 07944759507, 7th November
item.description:
Dear sir/madam Could you please ask aerial manager & Trowbridge resident association chair member for an update on Osborne Road barrier gate being fixed. Trowbridge resident association chair member advertising no updates, information for a number of yea

item.title: Tip of a key is stuck inside a keyhole. Looks like it broke off, 7th November
item.description:
Tip of a key is stuck inside the keyhole. it broke off. If a resident closes the parking gate, no cars will be able to exit as they won't be able to put their own key inside to open it . Please can you send someone to fix the issue. The keyhole is not straight it's slanting downwards due to wear and tear and constant use. Gravity is also pulling the gate downwards. Please fix this problem asap. Ideally tomorrow, this gate problem is causing inconvenience for the residents! Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Kent Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping, 7th November
item.description:
Commercial waste being left on the pavement for hours instead of being left within an allotted collection windows which is contrary to Bromley’s website and national standards. Waste and recycling must be kept on your premises (not the public pavement or street) until the permitted collection window. If your trade waste provider specifies a time, you should only move your waste to the kerbside immediately before collection

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Beckenham Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
